findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials on WordPress REST API endpoints can enable attackers to read sensitive content and potentially perform authenticated actions on behalf of logged-in users.
findings.exploitation_steps: 1. Host malicious JavaScript on attacker domain 2. Craft XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials 3. Read response data including potentially sensitive page content 4. If user is authenticated, attempt privileged API calls to modify content or access private data
